abort.unknown_authorize_url_generation: Unknown error generating an authorise URL.

device_project_upgrade.description:
Update the Nest Device Access Project with your new OAuth Client ID ([more info]({more_info_url}))
1. Go to the [Device Access Console]({device_access_console_url}).
1. Click the bin icon next to *OAuth Client ID*.
1. Click the `...` overflow menu and *Add Client ID*.
1. Enter your new OAuth Client ID and click **Add**.

Your OAuth Client ID is: `{client_id}`

link.description:
To link your Nest account, [authorise your account]({url}).

After authorisation, copy-paste the provided PIN code below.
